thread.title: St. Jude Medical shares surge 13% on report Abbott Labs prepping $25 bln bid
thread.title_full: St. Jude Medical shares surge 13% on report Abbott Labs prepping $25 bln bid - MarketWatch

author: Ciara Linnane
title: St. Jude Medical shares surge 13% on report Abbott Labs prepping $25 bln bid
text: St. Jude Medical Inc. shares STJ, +1.58% surged 12% in premarket trade Thursday, after the Financial Times reported that Abbott Laboratories ABT, +2.52% is gearing up to make a $25 billion bid for the medical device maker, citing people familiar with the matter. The company is preparing an offer but has not yet put it forward, the paper said. Abbott Labs shares were not yet active in premarket trading.
